column9: Federation shipyards, aka Fleet Yards, are more than just places to build and repair starships—they represent the technological and industrial heart of spacefaring civilizations. They ensure readiness for exploration, defense, and diplomacy, making them critical to the survival and success of any interstellar power.

Borg shipyards, aka Vessel Assemly Nodes, are more than just places to build and repair starships—they represent the technological and industrial heart of spacefaring civilizations. They ensure readiness for exploration, defense, and diplomacy, making them critical to the survival and success of any interstellar power.

Terran shipyards, aka Fleet Yards, are more than just places to build and repair starships—they represent the technological and industrial heart of spacefaring civilizations. They ensure readiness for exploration, defense, and diplomacy, making them critical to the survival and success of any interstellar power.
